author: tvami
body:
PR description:

Minor modifications to the Pixel 2D template making code for the Phase-2 detector. After #31622 we are able to make charge reweighting in Phase-2, too, which will need the 2D templates.  Also added a unit test which creates a 2D template file.

PR validation:
The command which is in the unit test was run.

if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
This is not a PR, and there is no PR planned

cc: @mmusich
title: Changes in Pixel 2D template making code cfg for Phase-2 + adding a unit test
